title: clingo concretizer fails to handle closed version ranges like 2.6:2.6.99
body:
```bash
# mcclanahan7@turingtarpit: ~/tools/spack 16:51:26 $? 1
; sed -r -i -e 's/clingo/original/g' "$(spack config --scope user edit --print-file config)" && grep -P --color 'concretizer: \K(.*)$' "$(spack config --scope user edit --print-file config)"
  concretizer: original
# mcclanahan7@turingtarpit: ~/tools/spack 16:51:36
; spack spec 'python@2.6:2.6.99'
Input spec
--------------------------------
python@2.6:2.6.99

Concretized
--------------------------------
python@2.6.99%apple-clang@12.0.0+bz2+ctypes+dbm~debug+libxml2+lzma~nis~optimizations+pic+pyexpat+pythoncmd+readline+shared+sqlite3+ssl~tix~tkinter~ucs4+uuid+zlib patches=210df3f28cde02a8135b58cc4168e70ab91dbf9097359d05938f1e2843875e57 arch=darwin-catalina-skylake
    ^apple-libuuid@1353.100.2%apple-clang@12.0.0 arch=darwin-catalina-skylake
    ^bzip2@1.0.6%apple-clang@12.0.0+shared arch=darwin-catalina-skylake
    ^expat@2.2.10%apple-clang@12.0.0~libbsd arch=darwin-catalina-skylake
    ^gdbm@1.18.1%apple-clang@12.0.0 arch=darwin-catalina-skylake
        ^readline@8.0%apple-clang@12.0.0 arch=darwin-catalina-skylake
            ^ncurses@6.2%apple-clang@12.0.0~symlinks+termlib arch=darwin-catalina-skylake
                ^pkg-config@0.29.2%apple-clang@12.0.0+internal_glib arch=darwin-catalina-skylake
    ^gettext@0.21%apple-clang@12.0.0+bzip2+curses+git~libunistring+libxml2+tar+xz arch=darwin-catalina-skylake
        ^libiconv@1.16%apple-clang@12.0.0 arch=darwin-catalina-skylake
        ^libxml2@2.9.10%apple-clang@12.0.0~python arch=darwin-catalina-skylake
            ^xz@5.2.5%apple-clang@12.0.0~pic arch=darwin-catalina-skylake
            ^zlib@1.2.11%apple-clang@12.0.0+optimize+pic+shared arch=darwin-catalina-skylake
        ^tar@1.32%apple-clang@12.0.0 arch=darwin-catalina-skylake
    ^libffi@3.3%apple-clang@12.0.0 patches=26f26c6f29a7ce9bf370ad3ab2610f99365b4bdd7b82e7c31df41a3370d685c0 arch=darwin-catalina-skylake
    ^openssl@1.0.2u%apple-clang@12.0.0+systemcerts arch=darwin-catalina-skylake
        ^perl@5.32.1%apple-clang@12.0.0+cpanm+shared+threads arch=darwin-catalina-skylake
    ^sqlite@3.34.0%apple-clang@12.0.0+column_metadata+fts~functions~rtree arch=darwin-catalina-skylake

# mcclanahan7@turingtarpit: ~/tools/spack 17:14:13 $? 1
; sed -r -i -e 's/original/clingo/g' "$(spack config --scope user edit --print-file config)" && grep -P --color 'concretizer: \K(.*)$' "$(spack config --scope user edit --print-file config)"
  concretizer: clingo
# mcclanahan7@turingtarpit: ~/tools/spack 17:14:17
; spack spec 'python@2.6:2.6.99'
... # lots of output
==> Error: python@2.6:2.6.99 does not satisfy unknown
```
